execution.deliverySummary: ['SSH into macmini to verify authorized_keys contains matching public key', 'Check SSH daemon config (/etc/ssh/sshd_config) on macmini for PermitRootLogin, PubkeyAuthentication settings', 'Compare local public key (~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub) with key in remote authorized_keys', 'Test with passphrase-less key if using Passphrase phrase', 'Verify SSH retry script (/Users/shreyas-clawd/Documents/PersonalOS/memory/tools/ssh-retry.sh) works once authentication is fixed']
